common.help:
Available commands:
/start - Show welcome message & rooms
/help - Show this help message
/list_rooms - List all available rooms
/my_rooms - List rooms you have joined
/join_room <room_id> - Join a specific room
/leave_room <room_id> - Leave the specified room

Admin Commands:
/create_room <room_name> - Create a new room
/delete_room - Select a room to delete
/kick_user <room_id> <user_id> - Kick a user from a room
/create_scenario <scenario_name> - Create a new game scenario
/delete_scenario <scenario_id> - Delete a scenario
/add_scenario_json <json_payload> - Add scenario from JSON
/create_game - Interactively create a new game
/games - List active games and their status
/assign_roles <game_id> - Assign roles to players in a game
common.error_permission_denied: You are not authorized to use this command.
common.callback_failed_edit: Failed to edit message after action.

scenario.create_success:
Scenario '%s' created successfully! ID: %s
Use /add_role %s <role_name> to add roles.

game.assign_scenario_success: Successfully assigned scenario '%s' (ID: %s) to room '%s' (ID: %s) and created game '%s'
game.assign_scenario_error_update_room: Error updating room '%s' with scenario info: %v
game.assign_scenario_error_game_create: Scenario assigned, but failed to create game: %v
game.assign_roles_success_public: Roles assigned for game %s. Check your private messages for your role!
game.assign_roles_error_player_mismatch: Role count (%d) does not match player count (%d) for game '%s'
game.assign_roles_error_updating_game: Error updating game '%s' after assigning roles: %v
game.assign_roles_error_sending_private: Failed to send role privately to user %d: %v
game.create_game_select_room_prompt: برای شروع بازی گروه رو انتخاب کن:
game.create_game_confirm_prompt:
دکمه *پخش نقش* رو بزن تا نقش ها تصادفی و اتوماتیک برای بازیکنان فرستاده بشه


دکمه *انتخاب کارت* رو بزن تا بازیکنان نقششون رو خودشون تصادفی انتخاب کنن

`نقش ها:
- %s`
